resources.string: Kanade Tachibana (Angel Beats!) is a club president.
Megumin is a character from Gakkougurashi.
Futabu is an Anime about football.
The person inside Elizabeth is based on the director of Gintama.
Konosuba is an Anime that takes place in an RPG.
Naruto is a story about a possesed child.
Alphonse is a big guy in small armor.
Did it take Ash until 2019 to win the championship.
Bleach is an anime about a sword user named stawberry.
Felix from Re:zero is a boy.
The creator of Rurouni Kenshin is a pedophile.
